titleStmt.title: By the Queene. An exemplication of her Maiesties letters patent, concerning her highnesse towne and port of Hasting, in the Countie of Sussex
Proclamations. 1578-10-31
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Requires money be collected throughout England for restoration of the Hastings roadstead.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
